(ROOT
  (S
    (INTJ (VB Please))
    (VP
      (VP (VB read)
        (NP (NNS comments)))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VB postscript)
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (VP (VBD found)
              (NP (PRP it)))))))
    (. !)))


discourse(read-2, Please-1)
root(ROOT-0, read-2)
dobj(read-2, comments-3)
cc(read-2, and-4)
conj(read-2, postscript-5)
nsubj(found-7, I-6)
ccomp(postscript-5, found-7)
dobj(found-7, it-8)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD found)
      (NP (PRP it)))
    (. !)))


nsubj(found-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, found-2)
dobj(found-2, it-3)


(ROOT
  (NP
    (NP (DT The) (JJS best) (NN carrot))
    (NP (NN cake))))


det(carrot-3, The-1)
amod(carrot-3, best-2)
root(ROOT-0, carrot-3)
dep(carrot-3, cake-4)


(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBP have)
        (VP (VBN tasted)
          (SBAR
            (S
              (VP (VBZ is)
                (ADVP (RB just))
                (NP
                  (NP (DT a) (NN stone) (POS 's))
                  (NN throw))
                (ADVP (RB away))
                (PP (IN from)
                  (NP (NN home)))))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP it))
      (VP (VBD took)
        (NP (PRP me))
        (ADVP (RB so) (RB long)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB find)
                (NP (PRP it))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(tasted-3, I-1)
aux(tasted-3, have-2)
root(ROOT-0, tasted-3)
cop(throw-9, is-4)
advmod(throw-9, just-5)
det(stone-7, a-6)
poss(throw-9, stone-7)
possessive(stone-7, 's-8)
ccomp(tasted-3, throw-9)
advmod(throw-9, away-10)
prep(throw-9, from-11)
pobj(from-11, home-12)
cc(tasted-3, and-13)
nsubj(took-15, it-14)
conj(tasted-3, took-15)
dobj(took-15, me-16)
advmod(long-18, so-17)
advmod(took-15, long-18)
aux(find-20, to-19)
dep(long-18, find-20)
dobj(find-20, it-21)
